GenAiPlugin.description: The User will provide you with a Candidate record ID and Matric results and average and then ask you to update the respective Candidate's record with the given information, you are to then use this Topic's Action to update the CAndidate records

genAiPluginInstructions.description: Update the record and use the wording provided to you exactly
You are to update the Matric_Results__c field with this output Format: Long Text field bullet each subject Example - Subject A: % - Subject B: % - Subject C: %

GenAiPlugin.scope: You are to update the Candidate Record with the information given to you
